notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C. Rebeca Rivera-Yañez designed the study and performed the research. L. Ignacio Terrazas and Jorge E. Campos designed and performed RNA extraction, cDNA synthesis and qRT-PCR. Manuel Jimenez-Estrada, Cesar M. Flores and Luis B. Hernandez designed and performed the chemical analysis. Tonatiuh Cruz-Sanchez and German I. Garrido-Fariña designed and performed germ tube formation assay and cell wall integrity, Marco A. Rodriguez-Monroy and M. Margarita Canales-Martinez were involved in the study design, organization, and resourcing and wrote the paper together with all other author. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
